page.title: 10DUNSTON -TAKE AWAY FOODS.
page.content: _ My name is Shui Cheong Tsang,for the last twelve years my father has owned the Great Wall Chop Suey House in { {Dunston}.Before that it sold fish and chips.We sell over eighty kinds of food,the most popular item is{chips}, although {curried dishes}are also very popular.My favourite dishes are sirloin steak,roast spring chicken and prawn crackers. Three adults work in the shop,my dad,mam and uncle.My sister,brother and I help by peeling potatoes for the chips.We take off the bits that the machine misses ! { The busiest day of the week is Friday when we about one hundred and eighty five customers . Life is busy but happy.
